```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

Y1 <- c(28, 26, 31, 27, 35)
Y2 <-  c(34, 29, 25, 31, 29)
Y3 <- c(31, 25, 27, 29, 28)

# Sample size in each groups
n1 = length(Y1); n2 = length(Y2); n3 = length(Y3);

# create data frame for this data
df <- data.frame("color"=rep(c(1, 2, 3), c(n1, n2, n3)) , "resp"= c(Y1, Y2, Y3))

# Visualize
df %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x=color, y=resp)) +
  xlab("Color (1=Blue, 2=Green, 3=Orange)") +
  ylab("Responses")
```
